text: Aur eman daron ney jab (kuffar kay) lashkaron ko dekha (bay saakhta) keh uthay! Kay enhin ka wada humen Allah Taalaa ney aur uss kay rasool ney diya tha aur Allah Taalaa aur uss kay rasool ney sach farmaya aur iss (cheez) ney unn kay eman mein aur shewa-e-faman bardari mein aur izafa ker diya
